meanings.sent1: She studied intensively for her exam, staying up late every night.
meanings.sent2: The athletes trained intensively to prepare for the competition.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel searched intensively for its hidden acorn stash.
meanings.sent4: The detective examined the crime scene intensively, looking for clues.
meanings.sent5: The chef cooked the dish intensively, ensuring every flavor was perfect.

meanings.definition: In a concentrated or thorough manner
meanings.sent1: The researchers analyzed the data intensively to draw accurate conclusions.
meanings.sent2: The students worked intensively on their group project to meet the deadline.
meanings.sent3: The cat groomed itself intensively, making sure every fur was in place.
meanings.sent4: The gardener tended to the plants intensively, ensuring they thrived.
meanings.sent5: The painter focused intensively on each brushstroke, creating a masterpiece.
